title: EKKO W DELAY
body: I feel like his w needs to have a little less delay because its really hard to trap enemys and its really only working for me as a minion crowd control.. Is anyone else like this or am I just not using it at the right time?

replies.body: it certainly doesn't, just need some prediction, try using it from fog of war or a brush coz they can only see the cast animation and if your versing decent people they will move indirectly once seen it cast so try to throw it randomly, it's mainly used as a ganking/team fight tool and can be utilized well with your ult and zhonyas
Ohh I thought I might have been doing something wrong.. Thanks, and ill try that next time and see how it goes :)

Your using it wrong, pay attention to where the minion wave is, and where the enemy laner has to be to CS when the time comes for it to land, and then jump them.

Fact is Ekko requires you to be able to actually outplay your opponent.
